column1: Kata Robata////We just left the parking lot ...... place was about 50-60% full. We were seated right away when we walked in
column2: as they weren't that busy. After being seated we sat for 15-20 minutes without even being acknowledged. No servers came over. No one checked on us. No one brought us drinks. Nothing. Again
column3: they weren't that busy. So while my review isn't actually on the food
column4: it's on the place and service over all. I didn't come just for the food but for good customer service and a good restaurant staff. We heard they were rated well and top list in Houston ........ but we weren't impressed by being ignored.
